code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(final RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String id = request.param("id").     GetStoredScriptRequest getRequest = new GetStoredScriptRequest(id).     getRequest.masterNodeTimeout(request.paramAsTime("master_timeout", getRequest.masterNodeTimeout())).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().getStoredScript(getRequest, new RestStatusToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
